export var loadState=function loadState(){try{var serializedState=localStorage.getItem("state");if(serializedState===null){return undefined;}return JSON.parse(serializedState);}catch(err){return undefined;}};export var saveState=function saveState(state){try{var serializedState=JSON.stringify(state);localStorage.setItem("state",serializedState);}catch(err){//ignore
}};export default loadState;
